IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ST. MICHAEL'S COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL PROVIDES A DYNAMIC CURRICULUM THAT IS BUILT ON EXCELLENCE AND INSPIRES STUDENTS TO: LEARN WITH CONFIDENCE, LEAD WITH CHARACTER, AND ACHIEVE LASTING SUCCESS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ST. MICHAEL'S COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL PROVIDES A DYNAMIC CURRICULUM THAT IS BUILT ON EXCELLENCE AND INSPIRES STUDENTS TO: LEARN WITH CONFIDENCE, LEAD WITH CHARACTER, AND ACHIEVE LASTING SUCCESS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDING OF ELEMENTARY SCHOOL EDUCATION (GRADES PRESCHOOL THROUGH GRADE 8) SERVING APPROXIMATELY 199 STUDENTS DURING FY 2018.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVISION OF SPECIAL PROGRAMS CONSISTING OF MUSIC, AFTER-SCHOOL ACTIVITIES, TUTORING, SUMMER AND THEATER CAMPS, WHICH ARE PROVIDED OUTSIDE OF REGULAR CLASS WORK, FOR APPROXIMATELY 250 STUDENTS DURING FY 2018.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED FOR THE MAINTENANCE OF THE VAN BEUREN BUILDING, NEED-BASED SCHOLARSHIPS, DIVERSITY AND LEARNING DISABLED, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR TEACHERS IN THE STUDY OF ALTERNATIVE LEARNING METHODS, AND FACULTY ENRICHMENT BEYOND THE CLASSROOM.

ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE SCHOOL AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY IF THE SCHOOL HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT MORE LIKELY THAN NOT WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. THE SCHOOL IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. THE SCHOOL RECOGNIZES INTEREST AND PENALTIES, IF APPLICABLE, AS A COMPONENT OF OPERATING EXPENSES.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES INCLUDED ON PART VIII, LINE 8(B) 29,642.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES INCLUDED ON PART VIII, LINE 8(B) 29,642.
POLICY IS DESCRIBED IN ALL MEDIA, INTERVIEWS, BROCHURES, APPLICATIONS, ADMISSIONS AND ASSISTANCE MATERIAL

THE FINANCIAL AID AWARDS ARE CREDITED TO THE STUDENT'S ACCOUNT THROUGH THE STUDENT BILLING SOFTWARE IN THE BUSINESS OFFICE. FOR RECIPIENTS OF NEED-BASED FINANCIAL AID, THE SCHOOL USES SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICES AS A GUIDE AND REQUIRES 2 YEARS OF INCOME TAX RETURNS.
ST. MICHAEL'S COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL PROVIDES THE HEAD OF SCHOOL WITH HOUSING. THIS IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY FINANCE COMMITTEE MEMBERS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY IS OVERSEEN BY THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE. ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT WOULD BE REVIEWED WITH THE BOARD MEMBER. IF A CONFLICT WAS JUDGED TO EXIST, HE/SHE WOULD BE ADVISED TO RECUSE THEMSELF FROM DISCUSSION AND VOTING ON ANY RELATED ISSUE. IF THE CONFLICT IS SEVERE, THE INDIVIDUAL WOULD BE ADVISED TO RECUSE HIMSELF FROM THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMPARES THE COMPENSATION OF KEY INDIVIDUALS TO COMPENSATION PAID TO INDIVIDUALS IN SIMILAR POSITIONS AT SIMILAR-SIZED SCHOOLS. THE RESULTS OF THE COMMITTEE ARE REPORTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE DELIBERATIONS AND DECISION REGARDING THE COMPENSATION WAS DOCUMENTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE SCHOOL'S FINANCE COMMITTEE ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT AUDIT AND THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
